ParameterFields.Name: Switch to Set
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The switch to set when the proper Wind Waker song has been played.

ParameterFields.Name: Wind Waker Song Trigger
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The song to play on the Wind Waker to trigger the switch.

ParameterFields.Name: Show Wind Emblem Model
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Determines if the wind crest is shown where the trigger is. The emblem model scales with the object.
